mapper.select: select wt.wishlist_id, wt.user_id, wt.crew_id, wt.created_at, ct.crew_name, ct.title, ct.thumbnail_picture, gt.gungu_name from wishlist_tb wt left outer join crew_tb ct ON wt.crew_id = ct.crew_id left outer join gungu_tb gt ON ct.gungu_id = gt.gungu_id where wt.user_id = #{userId} order by wt.created_at DESC
